However, modifying a naphthalene with polar functional groups or those disrupting its planar structure can have varying effects. Methoxy groups are slightly electron-donating and generally reduce the melting point due to steric hindrance and less optimal packing, with an estimated effect of -5 per group. Correcting the initial prediction with these considerations, we get a revised estimate.
